name: KeyBindingGame
description:
This game is based on idea of changing controls as a gameplay mechanics. On left bottom corner can player see control scheme. By touching colorful button you change key assignment. 

For playing please use 16:9 fullscreen. There is some setting I miss before build. 

In botom left corner may be a flover that show what is actual keybinds. However I probably mess up connecting  it to right corner, it's position can be a little different.

I didn't really believe I can submit game for GMTK GameJam 2020 because of my personal life. I manage get by a little parts around 8 hours to make this game. Why did I even try to participate? I got idea for a game when I hear theme for the first time and I want to share my take on it.

Thank you for playing and be careful. 

- JJ_0
